overview:
Colin Cheng currently works at MintTwist as the Web Marketing Co-ordinator. MintTwist is a London based digital agency offering the full spectrum of digital media services including web design, web development, SEO, web marketing and much more. Colin focuses on organising the SEO tasks and helping clients improve their rankings!

Colin Cheng used to work at myhomepage.com as a developer/analyst. myhomepage is a free, online personalized homepage website that also allows users to bookmark their favorites and store their passwords safely and securely online. He worked with data, marketing, research, testing, customer support and more.

Colin graduated from King’s College London with a BA Hons in English Language and Communication and is interested in, amongst other things, the web, social media, digital media, SEO, online marketing, blogging, writing, digital design and art. Having learnt HTML from a young age, he continues to enjoy working with digital media.
